headline: Virginia American Water Files Rate Request Driven by More Than $115 Million in Investment
summary: ALEXANDRIA, Va., November 03, 2025--Virginia American Water filed a request today with the Virginia State Corporation Commission (SCC) for new rates, reflecting more than $115 million in water and wastewater system investments. The request reinforces the company’s commitment to replacing aging infrastructure and continuing to provide safe, clean, reliable and affordable service in compliance with environmental regulations for the benefit of customers.
